title: Offer TensorFlow Docker Images Based on 18.04
body_html:
Nvidia is now shipping docker images based on ubuntu 18.04 (see), it would be great if TensorFlow started offering builds against these.

Ubuntu 18.04 has added Python 3.6.

Have I written custom code N/A
OS Platform and Distribution Docker
TensorFlow installed from Docker
TensorFlow version N/A
Bazel version N/A
CUDA/cuDNN version N/A
GPU model and memory N/A
Exact command to reproduce N/A

body:
Nvidia is now shipping docker images based on ubuntu 18.04 ([see](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker/issues/666#issuecomment-390039509)), it would be great if TensorFlow started offering builds against these.

Ubuntu 18.04 has added Python 3.6.
```
Have I written custom code N/A
OS Platform and Distribution Docker
TensorFlow installed from Docker
TensorFlow version N/A
Bazel version N/A
CUDA/cuDNN version N/A
GPU model and memory N/A
Exact command to reproduce N/A
```
